src: “Pano tili ndi mbewa zamiyezi inayi zomwe zilibe matenda a shuga omwe zinkadwala”, adawonjezera motero.
mt: “I have a lot of relatives who have died from diabetes-related complications,” said the driver.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: A Dotolo a Ehud Ur, pulofesa wa zamankhwala ku sukula ya ukachenjede yotchedwa Dalhousie ku Halifax, Nova Scotia komanso wapampando wamagulu azachipatala komanso asayansi amatenda a shuga a Canada Diabetes Association adachenjeza kuti kafukufukuyu adakali m'masiku ake oyamba.
mt: Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a member of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says the new drug could be a game-changer for diabetes patients.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: M'mene alili akatswiri ena, amakayikira ngati matenda a shuga angachiritsidwe, poona kuti zotsatila izi zilibe phindu kwa anthu ali kale ndi mtundu woyamba wa matenda ashuga.
mt: In the meantime, other researchers have suggested that the symptoms of this disease may have been confused with those of other illnesses, such as the common cold.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Lolemba , Sara Danius , mlembi wokhazikika wa komiti ya Nobel ya zolembalemba ku Academy yaku Sweden, adalengeza pa pulogalamu yapa wailesi ya Sveriges , akulephera kuyakhulana ndi Bob Dylan zokhudza popambana kwake pa 2016 pa Mphoto ya Nobel ya Zolembalemba , ndipo asiya kuthekera kwawo kosakaya mkuluyu.
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature laureate Bob Dylan was awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature for having "created new poetic expressions within the great American song tradition" and "been an influential force within American music."
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius adati “pakali pano palibe chomwe tikupanga, ndamuimbira ndi kutumiza makalata pa kompuyuta kwa nzake womuthandizira ndipo wandiyakha zabwino , pakali pano, zimenezo ndizokwanira”.
mt: “We don’t have a plan for this, I will talk to the computer and give it instructions and it will do the best it can,” he said. “We don’t have a plan for this, I will talk to the computer and give it instructions and it will do the best it can,” he said.
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: M'mbuyomo mkulu wa Ring, a Jamie Siminoff, adanenapo kuti kampani idayamba pamene belu lake la chitseko lapachitseko silidamveke mu sitolo mwake kumalo okonzera magalimoto.
mt: The company's founder, Jamie Siminoff, said the company started when he was selling his car in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Anapanga belu la WiFi, anatelo.
mt: 1. He is setting up a WiFi network.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff anati kugulitsa malonda kunakwera atakawonekera ku 2013 mugulu la Shark Tank komwe gulu lowonetsa linakana kupereka ndalama yoyambira.
mt: 2013 Shark Tank contestant Siminoff says the company is on track to make $1 billion in revenue this year.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Kumapeto kwa chaka cha 2017, Siminoff adawoneka pa wayilesi yakanena ya malonda ya QVC.
mt: 2017 will be Siminoff's last year on the QVC airwaves.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring nayeso anathetsa mikangano ndi kampani yolondera imene amapikisana nayo, ya ADT Corporation.
mt: The company, ADT Corporation, is suing the ringtone company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Pamene katemera wina oyeselera akuwoneka kuti akuchepetsa anthu omwalira ndi Ebola, mpakana pano, palibe mankhwala amene awonetsa kuti ndiwoyenera kuchiza nthenda ilipoyi.
mt: When a person is suspected of having Ebola, there is no need to panic, as there is no cure for the disease.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Imodzi mwa antibody cocktail, ndi ZMapp, poyambilira imawonetsa chiyembekezo pa kafukufuku, koma kafukufuku woyenera anapezeka kuti anali ndi phindu locheperako kuposa momwe amafunira popewa imfa.
mt: 1 of the 2 antibody cocktails, ZMapp, has shown promise in trials, but the trials were halted when it was discovered that the patients had been infected with the virus before receiving the treatment.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Pakafukufuku woyesa PALM, ZMapp adagwira ngati chiwongolero, kusonyeza kuti akatswiri asayansi adapeza poyambira ndikufanizira mankhwala atatu kwa iwowo.
mt: The PALM vaccine is in early clinical trials, and researchers say it could be ready for widespread use in as little as two years.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Bungwe la USA Gymnastics likugwirizana ndi kalata ya United States Olympic Committee ndipo ikuvomereza kufunika kwenikweni kwa onse a Olimpiki kuti apititse patsogolo chitetezo kwa osewera athu onse.
mt: The USA Gymnastics board has resigned and the United States Olympic Committee has accepted the resignations, and the entire board has been replaced with interim members.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Tikugwilizana ndi zomwe ananena USOC kuti chidwi chathu chili pa wosewera ndi makalabu, ndi masewera awo, zitha kupangidwa bwino popita chitsogolo ndi thandizo lomveka mu bungwe lathu, kusiyana ndikulanda masatifiketi.
mt: We are in agreement with the USOC that our bid is a joint effort between the city and the county, and that we have a strong track record of hosting major events, including the Olympics, and that we have the infrastructure in place to host the Games.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Gymnastics yaku USA ikuthandiza kafukufuku odziyimira payekha amene angawunikire za m'mene nkhanza za gawo lotchedwa la mphamvu kwambiri zomwe zafotokozeredwa molimba mtima ndi opulumuka aku Larry Nassar zomwe sizikadadziwika kwanthawi yayitali komaso ndikusintha kulikonse komanso koyenera.
mt: 2018 Winter Olympics gymnastics gold medalist McKayla Maroney has revealed she was sexually abused by team doctor Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to up to 175 years in prison last week.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics ndi USOC ali ndi cholinga chofanana- kupanga masewera olimbitsa thupi, komanso ena, kukhala otetezedwa mwanjira ina ili yonse kuti othamanga atsatire maloto awo motetezedwa, mwaubwino komanso kupatsidwa mphamvu.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have a similar responsibility - to create a safe environment, and also to ensure that no one is allowed to abuse their position of power, especially when it comes to minors, and to report any such incidents.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: M'zaka za 1960, Brzezinski anagwira ntchito kwa John F. Kennedy ngati mulangizi wake kenako nthawi ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and later Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Nthawi yosankha chaka cha 1976 analangiza Carter pankhani zakunja, ndipo anagwira ntchito yawu National Security Advisor (NSA) kuyambira 1977 mpaka 1981, kulowa mosithana ndi Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 saw Carter's inauguration, and he served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Ngati NSA, anathandiza a Carter kuyendetsa nkhani za dziko lapansi monga Camp David Accords mchaka cha 1978; kukhazikitsa maubwenzi wa Amlika ndi China kumapeto kwa 1970, kusintha zinthu ku Irani kumene kunadzetsa vuto la anthu ogwidwa ndi adani chaka cha 1979 komanso boma la Soviet kugonjetsa dziko la Afghanistan chaka cha 1979.
mt: According to NSA, Carter helped broker international agreements such as the Camp David Accords in 1978; normalize relations between the United States and China in the 1970s, end the Iranian Revolution in which thousands were killed in 1979 and the Soviet Union's invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Kanemayo, woseweledwa ndi a Ryan Gosling andi a Emma Stone anasankhidwa kuti alandile mphoto m'magawo onse.
mt: 2017 Oscar nominees Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were announced to be starring in a new film.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ndi Stone analandira zinsankho za mwamuna wochita bwino zitsuzo komanso mkazi ochita bwino zitsuzo motsatana.
mt: Gosling and Stone are promoting a new line of men's and women's underwear that matches.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Zosankhidwa zina ndi Chithunzi Chabwino, Otsogolera, Zakanema, Opanga Zovala, Wokonzaso ma Kanema, Nyimbo Zosakopera Zamukanema, Okonza Zopangapanga, Okonza Zamawu, Odziwa Kusakaniza Mawu ndi Opanga Zisudzo mukanema.
mt: 1. Introduction, 2. Lead, 3. Chorus, 4. Verse, 5. Chorus, 6. Verse, 7. Chorus, 8. Verse, 9. Chorus, 10. Verse, 11. Chorus, 12. Verse, 13. Chorus, 14. Verse, 15. Chorus, 16. Verse, 17. Chorus, 18. Verse, 19. Chorus, 20. Verse, 21. Chorus, 22. Verse, 23. Chorus, 24. Verse, 25. Chorus, 26. Verse, 27. Chorus, 28. Verse, 29. Chorus, 30. Verse, 31. Chorus, 32. Verse, 33. Chorus, 34. Verse, 35. Chorus, 36. Verse, 37. Chorus, 38. Verse, 39. Chorus, 40. Verse, 41. Chorus, 42. Verse, 43. Chorus, 44. Verse, 45. Chorus, 46. Verse, 47. Chorus, 48. Verse, 49. Chorus, 50. Verse, 51. Chorus, 52. Verse, 53. Chorus, 54. Verse, 55. Chorus, 56. Verse, 57. Chorus, 58. Verse, 59. Chorus, 60. Verse, 61. Chorus, 62. Verse, 63. Chorus, 64. Verse, 65. Chorus, 66. Verse, 67. Chorus, 68. Verse, 69. Chorus, 70. Verse, 71. Chorus, 72. Verse, 73. Chorus, 74. Verse, 75. Chorus, 76. Verse, 77. Chorus, 78. Verse, 79. Chorus, 80. Verse, 81. Chorus, 82. Verse, 83. Chorus, 84. Verse, 85. Chorus, 86. Verse, 87. Chorus, 88. Verse, 89. Chorus, 90. Verse, 91. Chorus, 92. Verse, 93. Chorus, 94
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Nyimbo ziwiri zochokera mu kanema, yotchedwa Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ndi City of Stars, zidasankhidwa kuti zilowe nawo mumpikisano wa nyimbo yeniyeni. Studio ya Lionsgate idasankhidwa ka 26 kuti ilowe nawo mumpikisano-kuposa studio iliyonse.
mt: 2 songs from the soundtrack, titled Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate was nominated for Best Picture, the first time a studio has been nominated for the award twice in the same year.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Kumathero kwa tsiku Sabata, Pulezidenti waku United States a Donald Trump, kudzera kwa ofalitsa nkhani, adalengeza kuti asilikali aku US azichokako ku Syria.
mt: On Saturday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a series of tweets, announced that US forces would be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Zidalengezedwa pamene a Trump adalankhulana ndi Purezidenti waku Turkey a Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The two were photographed together when Trump met with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Dziko la Turkey litengaso udindo woyang'anira asilikali omwe agwidwa pa nkhondo agulu la ISIS, malingana ndi zimene zinadanenedwa ndi akuluakulu, mayiko aku Ulaya akana kubwerera kwawo.
mt: Turkey has suspended its military operations against ISIS, in line with the wishes of the European Union.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Izi zikungotsimikiza kuti ma dinosaurs ena anali ndi nthenga, lingaliro lofalikila kale, komanso pafotokoza mwatsatanetsatane zinthu zimene mitembo yakale siingaonetse monga utoto ndi 3 dimension arrangement.
mt: 3D printing is also being used to create dinosaur fossils, which are believed to be millions of years old, and also to recreate objects that were created millions of years ago, such as baby dinosaurs and 3 dimensional arrangements.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Anthu ogwila ntchito za sayansi akuti nthenga za nyamayi zinali zophatikizana mitundu ya khofi ndi yofiira pamwamba ndipo m'mbali inali ndi mtundu wopitila koyelela kapenanso kuphatikizana kwa mitundu ya chikasu ndi yofiira.
mt: . Scientists say the eggs of female mosquitoes are made up of two layers, one of which is transparent and the other opaque, and that the latter is the one that is pierced by the male's needle-like appendage.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Popezanso zina zomwe zilipo zimathandiza kudziwa kusitha kwa nthenga mu mbalame.
mt: The symptoms of the disease are similar to those of the flu.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Chifukwa nthenga za dinosaur zilibe shaft zokula bwino, zotchedwa rachis, koma imakhala ndi zina za nthenga -zosongoka ndi zosongoka zocheperapo. Ofufuzawo anati rachis imayenera kusintha pambuyo pake kusiyana ndi zinazi.
mt: Because dinosaur vertebrae were poorly preserved, they were identified as ribs, but they were actually neural spines, which are the bony projections that support the vertebrae. The researchers say the neural spines may have been mistaken for ribs because they are similar in shape.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: M'mene zinthengazi zikuonekera zikusonyeza kuti sizinali kugwiritsidwa ntchito yowulukira koma yowongolera matenthedwe kapena mazizilidwe amthupi kapena achiwonetsero. Akafukufukuwa akuganiza kuti, ngakhale uli mchira wa dinosaur wamng'ono, koma izi zikuwonetsa nthenga zawamkulu osati zankhuku.
mt: The incident is not believed to have been caused by a collision with a bird, but rather a large insect or other debris. While the object was described as a "dinosaur-like creature", it was not a bird.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Kafukufuku akusonyeza kuti, ngakhale nchira wa Dinosaur yaying'ono, koma izi zikuoneka kuti ndi nthenga zawamkulu osati zankhuku.
mt: While the dinosaur's tail is missing, it is clear that it was a large reptile, not a bird.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomba la galimoto linaphulika pa likulu la apolisi ku Gaziantep, mudziko la Turkey dzulo m'mawa ndipo lapha anthu awiri apolisi ndi kuvulaza anthu ena opitilira makumi awiri.
mt: 2 police officers and 20 civilians were killed when a bomb exploded in a police vehicle in Gaziantep, Turkey, late Sunday.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ofesi ya bwanamkubwa yati mwa anthu 19 omwe avulala ndi ogwira ntchito zapolisi.
mt: 19 people were injured in the incident, including police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: A polisi akuti akukaikila a Daesh (ISIL) omwe ndi agulu la uchifwamba pa chiwembuchi.
mt: A police officer was killed by a Daesh (ISIL) suicide bomber at a checkpoint.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Adapeza kuti Dzuwa limayenda mofanana ndi nyenyezi zina: zochitika za nyenyezi zina zimadalira kuwunika kwawo, kuzungulira kwawo, osati china chilichonse.
mt: He said the Dzuwa is like a human: it can see, hear, and think, but it can't do anything else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Kuwonekera ndi kuzungulira ndi zomwe zimagwilitsidwa ntchito kuti adziwe nambala ya nyenyezi yomwe ndi yogwilizana ndikuyenda kwa plasma.
mt: The patient was seen and treated for a head injury that caused bleeding in the brain.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Nambala ya Rossby ikamachepa, nyenyezi simakhala ndi mphamvu potengela kusintha kwa mbali yamaginito.
mt: The Rossby wave is a wave that propagates eastward, and is the reason why the jet stream is not a straight line.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Iwasaki nthawi zambiri adakomana ndi mavuto paulendo wake.
mt: Iwasaki has been in poor health for some time.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Iwo anaberedwa ndi achifwamba, analumidwa ku Tibet ndi galu wachiwewe, kuthawa ukwati ku Nepal ndikumangidwa ku India.
mt: 2 were killed and 1 was injured, and the group was forced to flee Tibet and cross into Nepal and then India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Mlingo wa 802.11n umagwira pa frequency ya 2.4 Ghz ndi 5.0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Izi zitheka kuti ibwenzedwe ndi kufanana ndi 802.11a, 802.11b ndi 802.11g, bola ngati station yokhazikika ili ndi ma wailesi ogwira kuwiri.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all supported, as if the device had multiple radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Changu cha 802.11n ndichochuluka kwambiri kusiyana ndi chazomwe chinasinthana nazo, ichi changu chake chimatha kufikira 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is much faster than the previous standards, and this one is aiming for 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: A Duvall, omwe ndi okwatira ndipo ali ndi ana akuluakulu awiri, sanasiye chidwi chachikulu pa Miller, kwa amene nkhaniyi imamukhuza.
mt: A Duvall, who is a father of two, was shot in the head by Miller, who was not immediately identified.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Atafunsidwa a Miller anati, “Mike amalankhula kwambiri nthawi ya mlandu, ndinali kukonzekela ndiye ndimavela zimene amalankhula”.
mt: Miller said, "Mike was very upset at the time of the incident, and I was trying to calm him down."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Tidzayesetsa kuchepetsa mpweya woyipa pa gawo lililonse la GDP ndi mulingo woyenera pofika mu 2020 kuchoka pa mulingo wa 2005”, Hu anatero.
mt: “We will try to bring the economy back to its pre-2005 growth rate by 2020,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Sadakhazikitse nambala yakachepetsedwe, ponena kuti izapangidwa potengera zotsatira za chuma cha China.
mt: 1,000 people were evacuated after a bomb threat, with police saying the device was a fake and that it was planted to disrupt China's trade talks.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu analimbikitsa mayiko otukuka kumene” kupewa m'chitidwe wakale owononga kaye ndikudzakonza patsogolo pake.”
mt: "We are not going to allow any country to dictate to us," he said.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Adawonjezerapo kunena kuti “salikuyenera kukakamizidwa kuti atenge mbali yoposera mulingo wawo wa chitukuko, udindo ndiponso kuthekera kwawo.”
mt: "I think it's important to remember that he's a human being, too, and he's going through a lot of stress right now."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Gulu la wophunzira aku Iraq adawonetsa zotsatira zawo nthawi ya 12:00GMT lero.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, Iraqi forces are expected to retake the city of Mosul.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ikuchenjeza Palibe amene angatsimikizire kuti chilichonse ku Iraq pakadali pano chidzayimitsa nkhondo zamipatuko, kuyimitsa kukula kwa ziwawa, kapena kusokonekera.
mt: There is no one who can say that anything in Iraq at this time is not related to the war, including the destruction of infrastructure, or the lack of services.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Lipoti layamba ndi pempho kuti pakhale zokambirana momasuka ndikupanga mgwirizano ku United States pazochitika zaku middle East.
mt: Reports say the talks will continue on Monday and will focus on the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Lipotilo likutsutsa kwambiri pafupifupi chilichonse pamalingaliro apano a Executive kulowera ndipo ikulimbikitsa kusintha kwakanthawi.
mt: The fire was quickly extinguished by the airport's fire department and the runway was reopened.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Choyamba pa malangizo 78 ndi mfundo yoyambitsa ubale wa ukazembe chaka chisanathe kuti malire a dziko la Iraq akhale otetezedwa kwa magulu aupandu komanso kubwenzeletsa ma ubale a ukazembe ndi maiko ozungulira nao.
mt: 78 countries and organizations have pledged to help rebuild Iraq after the war to ensure that the reconstruction is done in a sustainable way and to promote peace and development in the region.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senator wa pakalipano yemwenso ndi nkazi wa mtsogoleri wa dziko a Christina Fernandez de Kirchner waulula kuti azaima nao pa chitsankho cha utsogoleri dzulo madzulo ku La Plata, mzinda umene uli ntunda wa makilomita 50 (mamayilosi 31) kuchokera ku Buenos Aires.
mt: The president's husband and the senator in charge of the presidential office, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, announced that he would accompany her to the presidential palace in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mayi Kirchner adalengeza zoyima nawo pa chisankho cha pampando waupurezienti kumalo otchedwa Argentine Theatre, malo omwewo ankagwiritsa ntchito poyamba kampeni yawo mu chaka cha 2005 yaudindo wau Senate ngati phungu waku chigawo cha Buenos Aires.
mt: Mother Kirchner announced the opening of the Argentine Theatre, a project she had previously promoted during her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires City Legislature.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Mtsutsowu udayamba kamba ka mkangano pakhani yogwiritsa ntchito ndalama zothandizira komaso kumangira zokhuza mphepo yamkuntho ya Katrina; pamene ena odziwa zoteteza zachuma azipatsa dzina zimenezi kuti “Bush's New Orleans Deal.”
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized for being too slow and too small, and the name "Bush's New Orleans Deal" was coined.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Madzudzulidwe aufulu pa ntchito zomanga kwatsamira kwambiri popereka mwayi wa zintchito zomangamanga kwa anthu woganizilidwa kuti amakhala mu Washington.
mt: The investigation is ongoing into the death of a man who was found in a car in a parking lot in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Anthu opitilira 4 miliyoni adapita ku Rome kuti akakhale nawo pamaliro.
mt: 4 million people are expected to arrive in Rome to attend the event.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Kunabwera anthu wochuluka kwambiri zimene zinapangitsa kukhala kovuta kwa aliyense kukhalanawo pa maliro amene anali ku St. Peter's Square.
mt: 100,000 people are expected to attend the funeral of the late Pope John Paul II, who will be buried in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Makanema akulu akulu adaikidwa ku Rome kuti anthu awonere mwambo.
mt: The Vatican has announced that Pope Benedict XVI will resign on February 28, 2013.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: M'mizinda yambiri ina yaku Italy komanso padziko lapansi, makamaka ku Poland, dongosolo ngati lomweli linapangidwa, ndipo anawonedwa ndi anthu ambiri.
mt: In several cities in Italy and across the world, including Poland, the statue was vandalized, and was seen by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Akatswiri ambiri adadzudzula a FBI akale poyangana ziNthu zomwe zinali zosavuta, makamaka magalimoto, ndicholinga chongotchukitsa FBI.
mt: Many people are questioning the FBI's involvement in the case, especially since the car was a rental and the FBI has a history of destroying evidence.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Congress inayamba kupeleka ndalama ku zochitika zolaula chaka cha 2005 ndipo ananena kuti bungwe la FBI liyike anthu khumi kuti azifufuza zolaula za akuluakulu.
mt: 2005 budget funds are being sent to the FBI, which is hiring 50 agents to investigate corporate fraud.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: A Robin Uthappa anagoletsa zigoli 70 pa mipira 41 pakumenya ma 11 kanayi ndi ma 6 kawiri.
mt: 41-year-old Robin Uthappa scored 70 runs in 11 balls and 6 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Osewela pakati a Sachin Tendulkar ndi a Rahul Dravid anasewera bwino kwabasi ndipo anapanga wothamanga zana limodzi.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both scored centuries and put on a partnership of 259.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Choncho, wicket ya kaputeni itatayika, India idakwanitsa kuchidachita ma run 36 kutayaso ma wicket 7 kuti amalize ma inning.
mt: 36 runs were needed to win, with 7 wickets remaining.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: A George W. Bush purezidenti wa U.S. adafika ku Singapore m'mawa wapa Novemba 16, kuyamba ulendo wake wotenga sabata imodzi yoyendera mayiko aku Asia.
mt: 16 November 2005, George W. Bush, President of the United States, arrived in Singapore, beginning a one-day tour of Asian countries.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Adalandiridwa ndi wachiwiri kwa Nduna Yaikulu yaku Singapore a Wong Kan Seng, adakambirana zamalonda komanso zauchifwamba ndi Nduna Yaikulu yaku Singapore a Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: 2nd Minister for Foreign Affairs and Law of Singapore, Mr. Wong Kan Seng, and Prime Minister of Singapore, Mr. Lee Hsien Loong, attended the funeral.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Pambuyo pasabata yolephera zisankho zapakatikati, a Bush adawuza anthu zokuza za malonda ku Asia.
mt: In the wake of the attacks, Bush told Asian leaders that the United States would not tolerate terrorism.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Nduna Yayikulu a Stephen Harper adavomeraza kupereka lamulo la boma la ‘Clean Air Act’ ku komiti ya zipani zonse kuti aliwunike, lisadawerengedwe kachiwiri, utatha mkumano wamphindi 25 ku PMO ndi mtsogoleri wa NDP a Jack Layton.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper announced he would send the federal government's "Clean Air Act" to a special committee of all MPs to study, with a report due back in 90 days, and a possible vote in the House of Commons in the fall, NDP leader Jack Layton said.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: A Layton adapempha kuti malamulo okhuza zachilengedwe asinthidwe pamene adakomana ndi a PM, ndipo adafunsa kuti “alembedwenso bwinobwino komanso kwathunthu” monga mwa lamulo la zachilengedwe la chipani cha Conservative.
mt: Layton said the government should have done more to prevent the cuts when it was first announced by the PM, and that "it's too little too late" in terms of the Conservative Party's cuts.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Chiyambireni pamene Boma la Chitaganya lidayamba kupereka thandizo la ndalama ku chipatala cha Mersey ku Devonport, Tasmania, boma komanso aphungu ena achitaganya adadzudzula zimenezi kuti ndi zodabwitsa pamene kukubwera zisankho zachitaganya mu Novembala.
mt: The Australian government and the state of Tasmania have begun issuing a new health warning to the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, after the state's health department discovered that the hospital's water supply was contaminated with a chemical used in the manufacture of explosives.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Koma Nduna Yaikulu a John Howard ati cholinga cha lamulo chinali kuteteza chipatala kuti chitsachotsedwe mphanvu ndi boma la Tasmania, poonjezela ndalama zokwanira AUD$45 million.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the hospital's closure was a "difficult decision" that would save the Tasmanian government AUD$45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Malingana ndi nkhani zatsopano, mulingo wa madzi a munyanja yayikulu akuwonetsa kuti tsunami adali akuyambika. Pali zochitika zotsimikizika za tsunami zimene zinalembedwa pafupi ndi Pago Pago ndi Niue.
mt: In response to the news reports, the mayor of the main island of American Samoa said a tsunami was not expected. There were no reports of a tsunami in Pago Pago or Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Sikudawonongeke kwakukulu kapena kuvulala kumene kwamveka ku Tonga, koma magetsi anathima kwa nthawi yochepa, zimene zidanenedwa kuti zidakanikitsa akuluakulu ku Tonga kulandira chenjezo la tsunami kuchokera ku PTWC.
mt: It is not known how many were killed or injured in the area, but power was cut to Tonga's capital, Nuku'alofa, after the tsunami hit, according to PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Masukulu 14 ku Hawaii amene ali m'bali mwanyanja atsekedwa onse pa chitatu ngakhale kuti machenjezo akuchotsedwa.
mt: 14 people in Hawaii have been reported dead after a tsunami hit the island on Sunday.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Purezidenti wa dziko la U.S. a George W. Bush adalandira mwansalangala zolengezazi.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush has signed a proclamation of remembrance.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Mneneri wa a Bush a Gordon Johndroe analonjeza North Korea “Njira yofunika ndi yodalilika kukwanilitsa cholinga chothetsa zida za Nuclear ku chisumbu cha Korea”.
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said North Korea "is a dangerous place and a dangerous regime that is threatening the world with nuclear weapons".
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Mphepo ya chikhumi yaphamvu yamu nyengo ya Atlantic Hurricane, Subtropical Storm Jerry, inapangika mu Nyanja ya Atlantic lero.
mt: 5th named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, forms in the Atlantic today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Akuluakulu aku National Hurricane Center (NHC) anena kuti mphepo yamkuntho yotchedwa Jerry pakadali pano ilibe chiwopsezo kunthaka.
mt: National Hurricane Center (NHC) officials say Tropical Storm Jerry is not expected to strengthen further.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Ma Injiniya a U.S. Corps akuganizira kuti mvula yogwa mpaka ma inchesi 6 itha kuononga mizere yotchinga madzi yomwe inali yowonongeka kale.
mt: 6 inches of rain is expected to fall over the next few days, according to the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ward yachisanu ndi chinayi, yomwe idasefukira madzi kukwera mpaka kufika ma fiti 20 panthawi ya mphepo yamkuntho ya Katrina, pakadali pano ili m'madzi ofikira m'chiuno pomwe mzere otchingira madzi wapafupi udalephera kutchinga.
mt: 20 feet of water flooded the ward, which was already flooded up to the ceiling by Hurricane Katrina, as the water rose faster than the pumps could drain it.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Madzi akutayikira pamwamba pa mzere wotchinga kuti madzi asadutse mugawo lokula mafiti 100.
mt: 100 feet of pipe was damaged, causing the water to flow into the river.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Woyang'anira wama Commons omwe ndi Adam Cueden adasonyeza kukhumudwa kwake pozofufutidwa pamene adayakhulapo ndi a Wikenews mwezi watha.
mt: Commons contributor Adam Cuerden was suspended after he reported a Wikipedia editor for harassment after the editor threatened him on the English Wikipedia in January.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Iyeyo [Wales] adatinamiza kuchokera pamayambiliro. Poyamba, pochita zimenezi ngati kamba kamalamulo. Kachiwiri, ponamizira kukhala ngati akutimvera, mpaka pamene adachotsa zaluso zake.”
mt: “This [Wales] is a place where you can start from scratch. First, it’s like a blank canvas. Then, it’s like you’re building a house, until you’re finished with your project.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Zomwe anthu adelari anakwiya nazo zinapangitsa kuti kupangidwe malamulo ena okhudzana zachiwelewele patsamba la intaneti lomwe lidali ndi zolaula zokwana mamiliyoni ambiri.
mt: The images are being shared on the internet, which has a large number of users.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Ntchito yomwe inachitika kwambiri inali yongoganiza, koma pologalamu inalembedwa kuti izitsanzira zomwe awona mlengalenga wa Sagittarius.
mt: The work is ongoing, but the discovery is being described as a new way of looking at the Milky Way.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Zotsatira zimene gulu limayang'ana zimayambitsidwa ndi mphamvu ya mafunde pakati pa zinthu zamdima zimene zimapezeka pamene pali gulu la nyenyezi ndi Milky Way.
mt: The findings are based on data from the Gaia spacecraft, which has been mapping the positions and velocities of stars in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Ngati akadaulo owona zamwezi, kukoka kwa dziko kumabweletsa mafunde, ndimomwemonso Milky Way imakokera Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: If the universe is expanding, the Milky Way is moving away from the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Akatswiri azasayansi adanena kuti zinthu zakuda zimakhudza zinzake zakuda momweso zimakhalira ndizomwe sizili zakuda nthawi zonse.
mt: Scientists say that the things that are not known are the things that are known that are not known at all times.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Chiphunzitsochi chimati zinthu zamdima kwambiri kuzungulira mlalang'amba zili mozungulira ngati chi yelo, ndipo zimapangidwa nditizidutswa tating'onoting'ono tambiri.
mt: The incident is being investigated as a possible suicide, and the body was found with a note.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Zomwe zikunenedwa pamawayilesi zakanema zikuwonetsa utsi woyera ukuchokera komwe kuli makinawo.
mt: 2,000 people were evacuated from the area as the fire spread.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Akuluakulu kudelaro akuchenjeza anthu okhala pafupi ndi chomera kukhala mnyumba mwawo, azimitse makina opeleka mpweya m'manyumba komanso asamwe madzi apampopi.
mt: Local authorities are investigating reports of a man who was seen entering a home, stealing a car and then filling it with water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Potengera zokamba za nthambi ya nyukiliya ku Japan, zidutswa za caesium ndi iodine zapezedwa pa makina a nuclear.
mt: Radioactive cesium and iodine were detected in the water supply of the Japanese capital, Tokyo, after a nuclear accident.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Adindo akuganizira kuti makontena a uranium atha kukhala kuti asweka ndipo akuchucha.
mt: The company is also investigating whether the containers were leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: A Dr Tony Moll adapeza Chifuwa chosanva mankhwala cha TB (XDR -TB) Kwazulu Natal ku South Africa.
mt: Dr Tony Moll has been appointed as the first Director of the South African Institute for Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) Research in KwaZulu Natal, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Mukuyakhulapo adati “matenda atsopanowa, ndiwovuta mosowetsa mtendere chifukwa cha momwe anthu akufera”.
mt: "The disease is spreading, and we are trying to contain it because people are spreading it."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Odwala ena ayenera kuti adatenga kachilomboka ali kuchipatala, Dr. Moll, akuganiza kuti awiri adali wogwira ntchito kuchipatala.
mt: The patient is expected to be discharged from the hospital, Dr. Moll, said the two are doing well.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
